Package marytts.util.data

Various relatively generic utilities for data generation and buffering.

SilenceDoubleDataSource  
 

Package marytts.util.data Description

Various relatively generic utilities for data generation and buffering. They are not clearly associated with any particular part of the Mary system and may be reusable in different contexts.
